channel.title: What the hell is this!?
channel.description:
Hi!
I have a server, and it's base is synergy-pkz, but i wanted to make a p ring to test monster difficultys, so i changed some of the stats in item.cfg, the compiler says nothing, but when i press run this comes up
[code]Server Powering up... Server has been launched.. Files initialized [ConnectionFilter] - Initialized Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:284) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:132)[/code]
and now i cant login, just instead of map and screen it all goes black :/
hope this community can help with this :( :confused:

item.title: What the hell is this!?
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

thanks everybody, i fixed it i would rep++ you all, but can’t

Read full topic

item.title: What the hell is this!?
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

you added an extra tab or an extra number

Read full topic

item.title: What the hell is this!?
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

Hi!

“already in use” close things that use your port 43594 like utorrent and that kind of stuff close it! EXIT BUTTON:)
I have a server, and it’s base is synergy-pkz, but i wanted to make a p ring to test monster difficultys, so i changed some of the stats in item.cfg, the compiler says nothing, but when i press run this comes up

Read full topic

item.title: What the hell is this!?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

use “Tabs” instead of “Spaces” when you edit config files like item.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: What the hell is this!?
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:2, topic:326671”][quote author=rafikd link=topic=423082.msg3106106#msg3106106 date=1264156337]
Hi!

I have a server, and it’s base is synergy-pkz, but i wanted to make a p ring to test monster difficultys, so i changed some of the stats in item.cfg, the compiler says nothing, but when i press run this comes up

Server Powering up... Server has been launched.. Files initialized [ConnectionFilter] - Initialized Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:284) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:132)

and now i cant login, just instead of map and screen it all goes black

hope this community can help with this
[/quote]

Are you sure that you have already been able to login to this server…
Because I do believe that there are “Anti-leeches” within the server.
It does appear so that you may not have removed one?

Edit: Never mind, maybe you have added spaces instead of the [tab] button…[/quote]

thanks man! you were right but now i got this:

Server Powering up... Server is already in use. [ConnectionFilter] - Initialized Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:132)

Read full topic

and now i cant login, just instead of map and screen it all goes black

hope this community can help with this [/quote]

Are you sure that you have already been able to login to this server…
Because I do believe that there are “Anti-leeches” within the server.
It does appear so that you may not have removed one?

Edit: Never mind, maybe you have added spaces instead of the [tab] button…
